sources.title: The River's Edge (1957) Ray Milland, Anthony Quinn & Debra Paget
sources.description: The River's Edge is a 1957 FILM NOlR adventure, crime, and drama DeLuxe CinemaScope film directed by Allan Dwan and starring Ray Milland, Anthony Quinn and Debra Paget. The picture is based on the unpublished short story "The Higher Mountain" by Harold Jacob Smith. Location filming was done in Amecameca and Iztaccihuatl in Mexico. Â  You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia .

metadata.Plot: A murderous thief on the run with stolen loot forces a poor rancher to guide him across the desert into Mexico. Accompanying them is the rancher's wife, who happens to be the killer's former girlfriend.
metadata.Actors: Ray Milland, Anthony Quinn, Debra Paget
